body_html: Long story short: tensorflow currently requires cuda 7.0. If you install version 7.0 in a separate directory from 7.5, and point tensorflow at it via the configure script (or LD_LIBRARY_PATH), it will work. Leaving this open to track future upgrades to the 7.5 SDK.
body_text: Long story short: tensorflow currently requires cuda 7.0.  If you install version 7.0 in a separate directory from 7.5, and point tensorflow at it via the configure script (or LD_LIBRARY_PATH), it will work.  Leaving this open to track future upgrades to the 7.5 SDK.
body: Long story short: tensorflow currently requires cuda 7.0.  If you install version 7.0 in a separate directory from 7.5, and point tensorflow at it via the configure script (or LD_LIBRARY_PATH), it will work.  Leaving this open to track future upgrades to the 7.5 SDK.
